statements: SELECT * FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE last_name LIKE '%son%';
SELECT email FROM customer_profiles WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id > 50;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM customer_profiles INNER JOIN purchase_history ON customer_profiles.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id;
SELECT first_name, last_name, purchase_amount FROM customer_profiles INNER JOIN purchase_history ON customer_profiles.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, product_name, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_amount > 1000.00 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;

SELECT first_name, last_name, email, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM customer_profiles JOIN purchase_history ON customer_profiles.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(purchase_id) AS total_purchases FROM purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(purchase_id) > 5 ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) as total_purchases FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_purchases > 1;

SELECT reviews.review_id, customers.first_name, purchases.product_name FROM reviews JOIN customers ON reviews.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN purchases ON reviews.product_id = purchases.purchase_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id < 50 AND email LIKE '%gmail.com' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, product_name, price FROM purchases WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, rating FROM reviews WHERE rating >= 4 AND product_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY customer_id ASC, rating DESC;
SELECT customer_id, review_text FROM reviews WHERE LENGTH(review_text) > 50 ORDER BY review_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers;
SELECT purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchases;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC, customer_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com%' ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, stock_quantity FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY unit_price DESC, stock_quantity ASC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 1000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;

SELECT c.customer_name, p.product_name, pi.quantity FROM customers c JOIN purchases pu ON c.customer_id = pu.customer_id JOIN purchase_items pi ON pu.purchase_id = pi.purchase_id JOIN products p ON pi.product_id = p.product_id ORDER BY c.customer_name, pi.quantity DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_catalog ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchase_history WHERE payment_method='Credit Card';
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, purchase_date, total_amount, payment_method FROM purchase_history WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM product_catalog WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, product_name, quantity, unit_price FROM order_details INNER JOIN product_catalog ON order_details.product_id = product_catalog.product_id;
SELECT tracking_id, estimated_delivery_date, status FROM shipment_tracking WHERE status = 'In Transit';
